page_info.title: UCI-INDIA
h1_tags: Explore Exciting Career Opportunities with Us

json_ld.title: Career Opportunities at UCI-INDIA
json_ld.description: Explore exciting career opportunities with UCI-INDIA, a leading IT solutions provider. Join our dynamic team and contribute to innovative projects in Salesforce development, UI/UX design, cloud technologies, and creative solutions. Apply now and become part of our success story.
json_ld.specialCommitments: UCI, a certified business, leverages More than 12 years of expertise to deliver innovative IT solutions. We focus on compliance, and quality and service for our clients.

itemOffered.title: Salesforce Developer
itemOffered.description: Design, develop, and maintain customized solutions within the Salesforce platform, ensuring seamless integration, scalability, and efficiency in delivering business-critical applications.
itemOffered.applicationInstructions: Apply through our online application form.

itemOffered.title: UI / UX Designer
itemOffered.description: Responsible for creating intuitive, user-friendly interfaces, conducting user research, and designing prototypes that enhance user experiences and align with business goals.
itemOffered.applicationInstructions: Apply through our online application form.

itemOffered.title: Microsoft Azure Specialist
itemOffered.description: Manage and deploy scalable cloud solutions in Microsoft Azure, ensuring optimal performance, security, and reliability for cloud infrastructure and services. You will also collaborate with cross-functional teams.
itemOffered.applicationInstructions: Apply through our online application form.

itemOffered.title: Adobe Specialist
itemOffered.description: Focus on utilizing Adobe Creative Suite to design and implement creative digital assets, including graphics, web designs, and multimedia, in line with project requirements and Efficient Solutions.
itemOffered.applicationInstructions: Apply through our online application form.
